Does anyone know if the diffusion effects (Soret, Dufour, etc) are enabled =
automatically 
with the multicomponent transport?  I'm using the freely pro=
pagating adiabatic flame 
example with an H2-O2 mechanism and I'm not able =
to match the flame speed with the 
literature.  My results are about 7% too=
 high.  When I checked the source code, I found the 
line m_do_soret(false)=
 in the file StFlow.cpp and it seems to me that this would force the 
Soret=
 effect to be off.  I've run the same grid with multicomponent and mixture =
averaged 
transport with different results - the mixture averaged is slight=
ly higher as I would expect.  
I have changed the line to m_do_soret(true),=
 recompiled and it didn't change the result.  I 
appreciate any help.  

Th=
anks.
Rusty
